title: 3rd Request...Did a WW II pilot crash into the east bank of the Brunswick River near the Leland Bridge. Is the American Flag flying in the Marshline there marking the spot? Did they recover the plane and pilot?
text:
Aircraft Pilot,



This is the third response IÍve sent to you. ItÍs possible you have
had our e-mail address blocked.



As far as we could determine, that is just a rumor about the plane
crash.



We couldnÍt find anybody who knows where the flag came from or if it
has some significance.
